TopicTitle: Hello! Not the First Post of mine.

Articles.Content:
Hi, I am somewhat an 'old' player since 0.20, but I feel kinda newbish. My crafts aren't space age material, and my skills are kinda bad.

I cannot get into a somewhat stable orbit without taking 2-3 tries or having mods. I want some advice on how to make my crafts better and how to become a great player and part of the forums.
Well hello to the forums and I would suggest watching scott manly to help your with your ships.
Welcome to the forums, enjoy your stay! There is a large thread for tutorials here, and Youtube helps too! So, once again, welcome, and I hope you enjoy your time here!

Welcome aboard!

Yeah, you'll learn a lot here.
